name: Ancient
effect:
When this wizard attacks, you may play a wizard to attack.
It has forgotten more than you'll ever know.
To Play/To Flip: Remove 5 cards in your discard pile from the game- 3 [Water] and 2 [Fire].
Reward: Reveal your hidden card and play it.

name: Annri 2.0
effect:
When you play a PC, You may play a hidden card.
I'll trade 1 Super Wufei for 1 Chinese Food.
To Play/To Flip: Log out each of your PCs OR replace an Annri

name: Anshou
effect:
When you play this item, spot 4 different elements or wound each of your PCs.
Dark weapons for a shadow fighter.
To Play/To Flip: Bearer must be a Twin Blade.

name: Aperion 2.0
effect:
When you play an item on Aperion 2.0, you may take a card of it's opposing element into hand from your discard pile.
The selection of PC types for Heavy Axemen in "The World" is somewhat limited.
To Play/To Flip: Each of your PCs must bear an item OR replace any Aperion

name: Bear 2.0
effect:
When you draw destiny for Bear 2.0, you may play that destiny as a hidden card.
Now that we can't PK, this world has gotten much more peaceful.
To Play/To Flip: Spot 3 hidden cards for each of your PCs in play OR replace with any Bear.

name: Bear's Sword
effect:
When you play this item, you may reveal your opponent's hand. For each item revealed, your opponent sacrifices a card.
In Bear's hands, it has helped many newbies.
To Play/To Flip: Sacrifice a lv. 2 or lv. 3 weapon on bearer. Bearer must be a Blademaster.

name: Big 2.0
effect:
Big 2.0 provides [Fire] and [Water].
cc c0Rp., h4Ck3R5, viRu535, 4nd "7h3 W0R1d” 7h3R3'5 90774 83 50M37hing 480u7 7hi5 94M3."
To Play/To Flip: Spot a hidden card for each of your PCs in play OR replace any Big.

name: Blood Suit
effect:
Light armor, named for its color.
To Play/To Flip: Spot 2 cards of opposing elements. Bearer may be any PC.

name: Blue Wyrm
effect:
Worse than any of the other wyrms.
To Play/To Flip: Return 3 of your hidden monsters to hand.
Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a lizard, you may play it and assign it to a new or unresolved fight. Otherwise, you cannot play it.

name: Breaking In
effect:
Each player returns 2 of his or her cards in play, each of a different element, to hand. You may play a dilemma.
If we're lucky, they'll think it was some kind of glitch or false alarm.
To Play/To Flip: Play an item.

name: Brown Wyrm
effect:
Storable- may attack when your lizard attacks.
Not as bad as the red ones.
To Play/To Flip: You must play this lizard to your portal.
Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is not a lizard, play it.

name: Busted
effect:
Each player returns his or her PC in play bearing no cards to hand. You may play a dilemma.
You two! You know what happens now.
To Play/To Flip: Play a non-storable monster to your portal.

name: Cave Bear Hood
effect:
Protective headgear worn by many PCs. Isolation Text Spoiler
To Play/To Flip: Spot 2 cards of opposing elements. Bearer may be any PC except a Wavemaster.

name: Chatting, Snaring, Twins
effect:
When an item is destroyed, its owner places it on top of his or her deck instead of the discard pile
The data volume is increasing. There are no other significant increases. So we should hit this area first.

name: Conqueror
effect:
An eerie tower of darkness.
To Play/To Flip: Discard 3 aliens or sacrifice 3 aliens.
Reward: Discard 4 aliens to wound 2 PCs.

name: Cracked, Worst, Milestone
effect:
Each player may draw an additional card for his or her normal card draw.
Help a new friend at the dungeon level B1 in this field.

name: Crim's Spear
effect:
When you play this item, you may make your opponent draw 5 cards.
A weapon that has defended the weak and fought for justice in Crim's hands.
To Play/To Flip: Sacrifice a lv. 2 or lv. 3 weapon on bearer. Bearer must be a Long Arm.

name: Dark Lord
effect:
When this wizard attacks, you may play a wizard to attack.
Wielder of black magic energies.
To Play/To Flip: Remove 7 cards in your discard pile from the game- 4 [Darkness] and 3 [Thunder].
Reward: Play a card from your deck. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Dark Maiden
effect:
Storable- may attack when your witch attacks.
Mistress of the night.
To Play/To Flip: Spot [Darkness] [Darkness] [Water] [Earth]
Reward: Return your witch to hand to wound a PC.

name: Dawn Wanderer
effect:
When you play Dawn Wanderer, your opponent may discard a monster to destroy it.
Hope it doesn't wander too close to you.
To Play/To Flip: No requirements.
Reward: No reward.

name: Death Implant
effect:
Storable- may attack when your alien attacks.
Don't let it get under your skin.
To Play/To Flip: Spot 2 monsters of opposing events.
Reward: Discard an alien to play a storable monster to your portal.

name: Death Implant Assault
effect:
It's more like a life extraction.
To Play/To Flip: Spot 4 aliens, each of a different element.
Reward: Play an elemental card from your discard pile.

name: Dejected
effect:
Alien monsters use powerful, wide- ranging magical attacks.
To Play/To Flip: Sacrifice an elemental monster.
Reward: Sacrifice a monster to destroy a monster of its opposing elements.

name: Dejected Assault
effect:
Silently floating, they appear unexpectedly.
To Play/To Flip: Sacrifice an elemental alien.
Reward: Place up to 3 aliens from hand on top of your deck and then place up to 3 aliens from your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Dolorous, Promised, Clavicle
effect:
When you play this field, name an element. This field provides that element.
If you knew you were going to die tomorrow, what would you do?

name: Dragon Puppy
effect:
Storable- may attack when your [Fire] monster attacks.
This puppy's bite is worse than its bark.
To Play/To Flip: No requirements.
Reward: Place your card in play on top of your deck.

name: Drygon
effect:
Announces its attack with lightning bolts. Isolation Text Spoiler
To Play/To Flip: Remove 5 monsters in your discard pile from the game.
Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a lizard, destroy a card of its opposing element

name: Earth Maiden
effect:
Storable- may attack when your witch attacks.
To Play/To Flip: Spot [Earth] [Earth] [Darkness] [Fire].
Reward: Return any number of your witches to hand to make your opponent sacrifice that number of cards.

name: Earth Rod
effect:
When you play this item, spot 4 different elements or sacrifice all monsters in your portal.
Strong in the power of Gaia.
To Play/To Flip: Bearer must be a Wavemaster.

name: Electric Spear
effect:
When you play this item, spot 4 different elements or place all cards in your discard pile under your deck.
Your enemies will be shocked.
To Play/To Flip: Bearer must be a Long Arm.

name: End of the World
effect:
Each player returns his or her non-storable monster in play to hand. You may play a dilemma.
What could have caused so much chaos?
To Play/To Flip: Reveal an action from your hand and play it.

name: Escape Plan
effect:
Each player returns his or her storable monster in play to hand. You may play a dilemma.
Are you alright? My ankle, I think I sprained it.
To Play/To Flip: Play a PC

name: Fake Money
effect:
Storable- may attack when your [Thunder] monster attacks.
What else would you find in a fake treasure?
To Play/To Flip: No requirements.
Reward: Discard a card to destroy a card of its opposing elements.

name: Flame Maiden
effect:
Storable- may attack when your witch attacks.
From the lands of molten fire.
To Play/To Flip: Spot [Fire] [Fire] [Earth] [Earth] [Thunder].
Reward: Return your witch to hand to destroy a monster.

name: Flamer
effect:
Storable-may attack when your witch or drain monster attacks.
To Play/To Flip: No requirements.
Reward: Discard any number of drain monsters to take that many cards from your deck into hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Forest Hsien
effect:
When this wizard attacks, you may play a wizard to attack.
He is a master of the magic of the trees.
To Play/To Flip: Remove 5 cards in your discard pile from the game- 3 [Water] and 2 [Fire].
Reward: Play a card from your discard pile.

name: Gakaku
effect:
When you play this item, spot 4 different elements or sacrifice all of your hidden cards.
A fiery edge completes this two- handed sword.
To Play/To Flip: Bearer must be a Blademaster.

name: Gan Break
effect:
Give that Heavy Axeman strength +3 (or +5 of you spot 3 different elements amongst your items).
Wide damage from tremors and boulders.
To Play/To Flip: Your Heavy Axeman must be in a fight. You must flip this card before drawing destiny.

name: Gardenia 2.0
effect:
When your PC wins a fight, you may place a card from hand on top of your deck.
Iris. The flower language is faith, hope, wisdom, and power.
To Play/To Flip: Spot 4 monsters for each of your PCs in play OR replace any Gardenia.

name: GiRai Doom
effect:
Give that Long Arm strength +1 (or +4 if you have 5 different elements in your discard pile).
Overwhelm a single target with this attack.
To Play/To Flip: Your Long Arm must be in a fight. You must flip this card before drawing destiny.

name: GiRue Slash
effect:
Give that Blademaster strength +2 (or +4 if you reveal 3 different elements amongst your hidden cards).
Double diagonal slash attack method.
To Play/To Flip: Your Blademaster must be in a fight. You must flip this card before drawing destiny.

name: Glygon
effect:
A terrible dragon of the forest.
To Play/To Flip: Spot 3 monsters in your portal.
Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a lizard, you may play it to your portal. It need not be storable.

name: Gob Machine
effect:
This goblin is strength +1 for each monster in your portal.
Likes to have a cheering section.
To Play/To Flip: Sacrifice 4 monsters.
Reward: Score up to 3 goblins from your portal.

name: Goblin Gang
effect:
Storable- may attack when your goblin attacks.
Still stealing things and still breaking them.
To Play/To Flip: No requirements.
Reward: Destroy an item.

name: Grand Mage College
effect:
When this wizard attacks, you may play a wizard to attack.
Fire and death are their primary study topics.
To Play/To Flip: Remove 4 Cards in your discard pile from the game- 2 [Fire] and 2 [Water].
Reward: Play a [Fire] card.

name: Green Sword
effect:
When you play this item, spot 4 different elements or log out all of your PCs.
Uses the verdant energy of the forest.
To Play/To Flip: Bearer must be a Heavy Blade.

name: Gremlin
effect:
Storable- may attack when your [Earth] monster attacks.
It seems cuddly until it breaks your stuff.
To Play/To Flip: No requirements.
Reward: Destroy an item.

name: Helba 2.0
effect:
When you play Helba 2.0, for each different element you spot, you may play a card of that element.
The vaccine won't be able to destroy the wave, but it may be able to corner it.
To Play/To Flip: All PCs must be healthy OR replace any Helba.

name: Helba's Staff
effect:
When you play this item, you may make your opponent discard his or her hand.
Who knows how much of Queen Helba's amazing power comes from her weapon?
To Play/To Flip: Sacrifice a lv. 2 or lv. 3 weapon on bearer. Bearer must be a Wavemaster.

name: Hobgoblin Gang
effect:
Storable- may attack when your goblin attacks.
A roaming pack of goblins.
To Play/To Flip: Sacrifice a monster.
Reward: Play a storable goblin from your discard pile to your portal.

name: Hydrosaurus
effect:
Storable- may attack when your lizard attacks.
To Play/To Flip: Return your monster in play to hand.
Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a lizard, play it hidden and perform this reward again.

name: Hysteria
effect:
Storable- may attack when your witch attacks.
She will make you crazy.
To Play/To Flip: Spot [Thunder] [Fire] [Wood].
Reward: Return your witch to hand to destroy a card of its opposing element.

name: Ichiro Sato
effect:
Beginning with you, each player plays 4 hidden cards.
He is also Bith the Black, legendary aide to Queen Helba.
To Play/To Flip: A [Water] monster must have just been destroyed.

name: Junichiro Tokuoka
effect:
Destroy all monsters in portals
We've got two high school girls, one middle aged man, and… Yuki. I guess that kind of makes us like a second Charlie's Angels.
To Play/To Flip: A [Earth] monster must have just been destroyed.

name: Kaoru Asaba
effect:
Remove each player's discard pile from the game.
If it bothers you, just think of me as the same woman you ran into.

name: Karin
effect:
Give that Heavy Blade +2 (or +4 if you spot 3 different elements in your score pile).
Quick draw and dice the opponent in a flash. Isolation Text Spoiler
To Play/To Flip: Your Heavy Blade must be in a fight. You must flip this card before drawing destiny.

name: Kyoto Tohno
effect:
Beginning with you, each player sacrifices 2 cards. He or she may play 3 cards, non hidden, to prevent this.
Inside and outside. They go together.

name: Lich
effect:
When this wizard attacks, you may play a wizard to attack.

Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck and play it.

name: Lich Lord
effect:
"When this wizard attacks, you may play a wizard to attack."
Lightning master and ancient magician.

Reward: Play a card.

name: Long Lived
effect:
Storable-may attack when your wizard or drain monster attacks.

name: Lookout
effect:
Each player returns his or her hidden card to hand. You may play a dilemma.

name: Macha
effect:
When Macha loses a fight, destroy all of your monsters

name: Madam Niagara
effect:
Storable- may attack when your witch attacks.

Reward: Return your witch to hand to return a PC and all cards on him or her to their owners' hands.

name: Magical Goblin Gang
effect:
Storable- may attack when your goblin attacks.
Glimpsing deeper into the future.

Reward: Draw a card.

name: Mai Minase
effect:
Beginning with you, each player removes up to 3 PCs, each of a different name, from his or her discard pile and then plays them. Then all PCs are wounded.

name: Marlo 2.0
effect:
When you draw destiny for your PC, if that destiny card is a storable monster, you may perform its reward.
Unleash the hounds of war… right?

name: MeAni Kruz
effect:
Give that Wavemaster strength +2 (or +4 if you reveal 4 different elements in your hand).
Skulls converge on the target.

name: Mimiru 2.0
effect:
When Mimiru 2.0 is in a fight, before you draw destiny, you may discard a card for each monster in that fight to ignore their rewards.
Your friend looks like me. Maybe I should have chosen vivid colors.

name: Mimiru's Sword
effect:
When you play this item, you may make your opponent play every card in his or her hand.
Mimiru wielded this weapon with passion.
To Play/To Flip: Sacrifice a lv. 2 or lv. 3 weapon on bearer. Bearer must be a Heavy Blade.

name: Minnow
effect:

name: Mog Napylon
effect:
Storable- may attack when your alien attacks.

name: Napylon
effect:

It's a strange floating ball of unknown origin.

name: Napylon Assault
effect:
An attack involving this alien cannot be avoided, if possible.

Reward: Take an elemental card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Napylon Invasion
effect:
Harmful to your health when encountered in large quantities.

Reward: Play a storable alien from your discard pile to your portal.

name: Niagara Coven
effect:
They will rain down furiously upon you.

effect:

name: Odoro
effect:

name: Ogre Gang

name: Org Napylon

name: Piros 2.0
effect:

May the stars shine upon you until the end of your journeys.

name: Priest's Stole
effect:
When you play this item, you may spot 2 cards of opposing elements and return them to their owners' hands.
A simple garment, worn like a cassock.

name: Soaring, Sky Madness, Compass
effect:

name: Sora 2.0
effect:
When your opponent avoids an attack, you may wound a PC.

name: Sora's Blades
effect:

name: Task 2.0
